overview: Life has its own way to surprise us. One minute you're a stranger, one minute later you're hitting off with someone! One day we're friends, and suddenly we're became more! These unpredictable meetings taste like mystery and advendure! If you're one of them, Can't Wait is for you. See how the day after a party Brandon hook up with Connor, aslept on the couch. Or guess the way Kyle becomes closer than just a roomate with Kip! And much more!
title: Can't Wait
